title: Stol (Serbian Carpathians)
text:
Stol (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Стол) is a <a href="mountains%20of%20Serbia">mountain</a> in eastern <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>, near the town of <a href="Bor%2C%20Serbia">Bor</a>. Its highest peak has an elevation of 1,156 meters above sea level. Like nearby <a href="Veliki%20Kr%C5%A1">Veliki Krš</a> and <a href="Mali%20Kr%C5%A1">Mali Krš</a>, Stol has a number of pronounced <a href="karst">karst</a> formations. There is a mountain hut with around 35 beds, maintained by the mountaineering society "Crni vrh" from Bor.
Rock climbing on Stol.
Stol is a developed climbing spot, with 68 bolted routes, difficulties from 4c to 8a+.
